byline.contributor: Somini Sengupta reported from the United Nations and Raphael Minder reported from Madrid.
byline.original: By SOMINI SENGUPTA and RAPHAEL MINDER

headline.main: António Guterres Pledges to Help Vulnerable as Secretary General

snippet: The Security Council formally approved the Portuguese politician’s nomination to succeed Ban Ki-moon as leader of the United Nations....
lead_paragraph: The Security Council formally approved the Portuguese politician’s nomination to succeed Ban Ki-moon as leader of the United Nations.
